japanese:
えー、宴もたけなわと言ったところでございますが、
次の撮影に参りたいと思いますでございます。
translation:
Well yes, the party DOES seem to be in full swing,
but I do believe we should be
moving on to the next shoot.

japanese: なにその挨拶。
translation: What's with the speech?

japanese: 今度は何を撮るの？
translation: What are we going to shoot next?

japanese:
それでは、最後のコンセプトを
発表させていただきます。
ずばり――
translation:
Now then, I would like to present the final concept.
Drumroll%p-2;――

japanese: デート！
translation: A DATE!
...Huh?

japanese: デートです！
translation: IT'S A DATE!

japanese:
ちょ、ちょっと待って？
どうしてそんなコンセプト？
デートって誰と……。
translation:
H-hold on?
Why is it that a concept?
A date with who...

japanese:
ふっふっふ、実はこれまでの撮影を見てたときに
ピンと来ちゃって。
translation:
He-he-he, I actually just thought of it
while looking at the photos just now

japanese:
一花は上杉さん相手だと
とーってもいい表情してたから、
よいところを伸ばして行く方針で！
translation:
You had such an amaaazing expression
on your face when you were with Uesugi-san,
so the plan is to get the good expressions going!

japanese:
というわけで、上杉さんには
デートの相手役として続投してもらいます。
translation:
So, we're going to have Uesugi-san
continue to play the role of your date partner.

japanese:
いいの？
そんな役を任せられちゃって……。
translation:
Is that okay?
To entrust that role to him...

japanese:
お前がいいなら、俺は問題ない。
一応、それっぽくなるように着替えてきたし。
translation:
If that's fine with you, I'm okay too,
I've changed my clothes to kind of look the part.

japanese:
……そうなの？
で、でも、じゃあ、みんなはどうなの？
translation:
...Is that so?
B-but, well, how does everyone else feel?

japanese:
いいんじゃないかしら。
あくまでも撮影のコンセプトだもの。
translation:
I guess it's alright.
It's simply the concept for a photoshoot.

japanese: ええ、いい表情をたくさん撮らせてください。
translation: Yes, please let us capture some good expressions.

japanese:
そうだよ。
ありのままの一花を残さなくちゃ、意味がないから。
translation:
That's right.
It'll all be in vain unless we can preserve you
as naturally as possible, Ichika.

japanese: みんな……。
translation: Everybody...

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、一花さんに素敵な想い出を
作ってあげなくちゃダメだからね？
translation:
Big bro, you need to help Ichika-san
make some wonderful memories, okay?

japanese: ああ、わかってるよ。
translation: Yeah, I understand.

japanese:
では、さっそく撮影スタートです！
まずは上杉さんがデートに誘うところから！
translation:
Alright, then let's start the shoot!
First will be Uesugi-san inviting Ichika on the date!

japanese:
はっ！？
そこからなのか？
translation:
HUH?!
That's where we're starting?

japanese:
さあさあ、歯がふわふわ浮くような甘い台詞で
エスコートしちゃってください。
translation:
Okay, okay! Ask to escort her with a line
that will sweep her off her feet.

japanese: いや、なにもそこまでこだわらなくても。
translation: Well, you don't have to be so particular about everything.

japanese:
やれやれ。
カメラマンの指示だ、従うしかないな。
translation:
Good grief.
It's the photographer's orders, we have to obey.

japanese: ……む、無理、しないでね？
translation: ...D-don't push your self if you aren't feeling it, okay?

japanese:
な、なあ一花……。
俺と一緒に……う、海でも、眺めに行かないか？
translation:
H-hey, Ichika...
W-would you...l-like to go look at the sea
with me?

japanese: ……ぷっ！
translation: Ppfft!

japanese:
（くっ……。
　慣れない台詞のせいで
　イントネーションが変なことに……！）
translation:
(Urk...
 Because I'm not familiar with this kind of line,
 my intonation must have been all strange!)

japanese:
ご、ごめん、ここで笑っちゃダメだよね。
ちょっと待って、気を落ち着かせるから。
translation:
I-I'm sorry, I shouldn't laugh.
Hold on, I need to calm down a little.

japanese: ふー……。
translation: Whew...

japanese:
うん、いいよ。
君からのお誘いを断るわけないでしょ？
translation:
Yes, that'd be nice.
You know I could never decline your invitation, right?

japanese:
うわぁ……。
ここから見る夕日、こんなに綺麗なんだ。
translation:
Oh, wow...
The sunset from here is this beautiful.

japanese:
ああ、茜色に染まっているせいか、
いつもとは違う世界のようだな。
translation:
Yeah, perhaps because it's so red,
it seems to be like a different world.

japanese: ねえ、あっちの岩場に行ってみよっか……。
translation: Hey, why don't we go to the rocks over there?

japanese: きゃっ！？
translation: Yeeep?!

japanese: おっと！
translation: Woah!

japanese:
大丈夫か？
足場が悪いんだし、その……ほら。
俺の手を離すなよ？
translation:
Are you okay?
The footing is pretty rough here, so...here.
Don't let go of my hand, okay?

japanese: うん、ありがとう。
translation: Okay, thanks.

japanese:
カーット！
自然な流れで、いい雰囲気でしたよ！
translation:
And, CUT!
That was such a good atmosphere, with natural flow.

japanese: そ、そうか、よかった。
translation: I-I see. That's great.

japanese: 二乃、顔が怖い。
translation: Nino, your face is so scary.

japanese: あんたもね。
translation: Yours is too.

japanese:
さて、カメラマンのみなさん？
次のシーンのプランは？
translation:
Alright then, photographers?
What's the plan for the next scene?

japanese: ダメだ、四葉はもうネタ切れらしい。
translation: Aw, looks like Yotsuba is out of ideas.

japanese: じゃあ、他のみんなは……。
translation: Alright, anyone else...

japanese: 三玖。
translation: Miku.

japanese:
ズ、ズルい二乃。
私に押しつけるなんて。
translation:
Y-you're so cunning, Nino.
To volunteer me like that.

japanese:
お前ら……。
ノープランすぎないか？
translation:
You guys...
Aren't you a little too lacking
in the planning department?

japanese:
あの……本当に、思いつきでよければ、
１つ意見があるのですが。
translation:
Um... I do have one idea,
if just a small suggestion is okay.

japanese: 何かな？
translation: I wonder what it is?

japanese:
ダンス、なんてどうでしょう？
さっき２人が手をつないでいるのを見て、
ふと思いついたんです。
translation:
How about you dance?
When I saw you two holding hands,
the thought came to me.

japanese:
ここでダンスか？
さっきも一花が砂に足を取られたし、
激しい動きは無理そうだが。
translation:
Dancing, here?
Ichika just got her leg caught in the sand,
so it seems impossible to move any more than this.

japanese:
まあまあ、カメラマンの指示なんだし、
役者は全力で応えなきゃね。
translation:
Well now, it is the photographer's instructions.
We need to fulfill our roles as best we can.

japanese:
それにさ、想像してみて？
夕暮れ時のビーチでのダンスなんて、
これ以上ないシチュエーションだよ。
translation:
And then, can you imagine it?
Dancing on the beach during a sunset.
There's no situation better than this.

japanese: ……一花がいいなら、俺は構わないが。
translation: If you're okay with it, Ichika, then I am too.

japanese:
ふふっ！
それじゃ――
translation:
Teehee!
In that case%p-2;――

japanese: Ｗｏｕｌｄ　ｙｏｕ　ｌｉｋｅ　ｔｏ　ｄａｎｃｅ？
translation: 'W O U L D  Y O U  L I K E  T O  D A N C E?'

japanese: ……Ｙｅｓ。
translation: ...Y E S.

japanese: どこで覚えたんだ、そんな言葉。
translation: Where did you learn that phrase?

japanese:
とある映画のヒロインが、社交界の
ダンスパーティーに誘われるシーンが好きなんだ。
繰り返し見ているうちに覚えてたの。
translation:
I love a scene in a movie where the heroine
is invited to a high society dance party.
I remembered the line watching it over and over again.

japanese:
さあ、フータロー君！
踊ろう！
translation:
Alright, Futaro-kun!
Let's dance!

japanese:
ちょ、い、いきなり手を引っ張るな！
と、と、おわわっ！？
translation:
Wai%p-2;――%p; d-don't just pull my hand all of a sudden!
Woa-woa-owawa?!

japanese:
そんなに慌てないの。
ほら、私と同じ動きをしてみて。
translation:
Don't be so flustered.
Come on, try to move the same way I do.

japanese: 簡単に言うが、結構難しいんだぞ？
translation:
You say it like it's easy, but it's really not,
you know?

japanese:
フォークダンスは踊ったことがあるが、
本格的なものなんて知らないし……。
translation:
I've done some folk dances before,
but nothing this proper...

japanese:
似たようなものだって。
はい、ここでステップ！
translation:
It's similar, I tell you.
Alright, and a step here!

japanese: えっ？　とっととと！？
translation: Huh? Wowowow?!

japanese: そうそう、できてるよ。
translation: Good, you're doing it well.

japanese:
でも、こういうときは男の子のほうが
リードするものなんだけどな～。
translation:
But, it's times like this
when the man should be leading.

japanese:
仕方ないだろ……。
さっきも言ったが、
そもそもダンスなんて経験がないんだ。
translation:
I can't help it...
Like I said before,
I don't have any dance experience from the start.

japanese: まだまだ勉強が足りないねぇ。
translation: Looks like you haven't studied enough, huh.

japanese:
ああ、まったくだ。
俺は本当に勉強が足りない。
学ぶべきことが山のようにある。
translation:
Yeah, that's for damn sure.
I really haven't studied enough.
There is a mountain of things I've left to learn.

japanese:
お互いにね。
まだこれから、私たちは
たくさん勉強していかなくちゃ。
translation:
For both of us.
We need to keep on studying
from here on out.

japanese:
どうした？　急に黙り込んで。
俺のダンスに文句があるのか？
translation:
What's up? Suddenly going silent like that.
Do you have a complaint with my dance?

japanese:
ここは任せる。
無理にリードしたら不格好になるしな。
translation:
I'll leave things to you, here.
If I forcibly lead you, I'll look pretty lame.

japanese:
ほうほう、どうやら
私の実力を認めてくれたようだね。
translation: Oh, my? It seems that you've recognized my ability.

japanese:
……俺は前から認めてるつもりだぞ。
お前はいつも、俺たちの先を行ってる。
translation:
...I've been recognizing it for a while now.
You're always leading the way ahead of us.

japanese:
ふふ、そうだったね。
私が私の道を行くのを、君は認めてくれてる。
translation:
Teehee, I suppose that's true.
You recognize that I'm on my own path.

japanese:
ただし、勉強については俺が教える側だ。
そこは譲らねぇ。
translation:
However, I'm the one who teaches you how to study.
I won't yield on that point there.

japanese: はーい、先生。
translation: Okay, Sensei.

japanese:
どうした？　急に黙り込んで。
俺のダンスに文句があるのか？
translation:
What's up? Suddenly going silent like that.
Do you have a complaint with my dance?

japanese: 帰ったら勉強しとく。
translation: I'll study up when we get back.

japanese:
こういうところまで勉強熱心だなぁ。
フータロー君らしいよ。
translation:
You're passionate for studying,
even at a time like this.
That's so you, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
俺の上達ぶりを見て驚くなよ？
今度は、俺がお前をリードしてやる。
translation:
Don't be surprised to see how much
I've improved next time, yeah?
I'll be the one leading you next time.

japanese: うん、次を期待して待ってるよ。
translation: Yep, I'll be waiting expectantly.

japanese: ……またこうして踊れるかは、わからないけど。
translation:
...I don't know if we can dance
like this again, though.

japanese:
どうした？　急に黙り込んで。
俺のダンスに文句があるのか？
translation:
What's up? Suddenly going silent like that.
Do you have a complaint with my dance?

japanese:
ううん、そうじゃないよ。
急に、昔のことが思い浮かんできちゃった。
translation:
No, that's not it.
I just started thinking about the past.

japanese: 誰かとの、ダンスの想い出か？
translation: You danced with someone in the past?

japanese: そうだね、ダンスと言えばダンスかな。
translation: Sure, you could call it dancing.

japanese:
君も、覚えてる？
林間学校のこと。
translation:
Do you remember?
The school camping trip.

japanese:
……ああ、そういや、
あのときダンスの話があったな。
キャンプファイヤーの伝説だったか？
translation:
...Speaking of which,
there was something about some dancing then.
Was it a campfire legend?

japanese:
うん……。
あれから今日まで、あっという間だった気がする。
translation:
Yeah...
It feels like no time at all has passed since then.

japanese:
色々なことがめまぐるしく起きたからな。
今も、そのドタバタした日々の真っ最中だ。
translation:
A lot of things happened really fast.
We're still right in the middle of those chaotic days.

japanese:
君と出会ってから、本当に色々あったもんね。
林間学校とか、二乃たちが家出しちゃったりとか、
今のアパートに引っ越したりとか。
translation:
There have been so many things since I met you, the
school camping trip, Nino and the others running away
from home, and moving into our current apartment.

japanese:
そういや、結局俺たち、
あのときフォークダンスは踊らずじまいだったな。
translation:
Speaking of which,
the folk dance ended before we could dance, huh.
...Huh?

japanese:
お前が言ったんじゃないか。
２人だけのキャンプファイヤーだって。
translation:
You were talking about it, right?
The two of us dancing by the campfire.

japanese: ま、まだそんなこと、覚えてたんだ。
translation: Y-you still remember that, don't you.

japanese: あー、その……忘れるわけないだろ？
translation:
Ah, well...
there's no way I could forget that, you know?

japanese: 忘れるわけないって……どうして……。
translation: You couldn't forget that...why?

japanese: きゃっ！？
translation: Yeeeep?!

japanese: 一花！？
translation: Ichika?!

japanese: あっ……！
translation: Ahh!

japanese:
ったく、またかよ。
どうした、急にリズムが崩れたぞ？
translation:
Good lord, AGAIN?
What happened, you suddenly lost the rhythm.

japanese:
う、うん、ごめん。
砂に足を取られちゃったみたい。
translation:
O-ooh, oops.
My leg got caught in the sand again.

japanese: あのときといい、ホントにお前はドジだな。
translation:
Just like back then as well,
you are really so clumsy.

japanese:
あはは……。
気をつけてるんだけどね、一応。
translation:
Hahaha...
Even though I am trying to be a little more careful.

japanese:
助けてくれて、ありがとう。
やっぱり男の子だね、しっかりと受け止めてくれた。
translation:
Thank you for helping me.
You really are a man,
you completely stopped me from falling.

japanese:
あ、ああ、当たり前だろ？
お前がこけるのを黙って見てるわけにはいかねぇし。
translation:
C-come on, that's obvious, isn't it?
I can't just sit back and watch you fall.

japanese: 本当に優しいね、君は。
translation: You really are kind, aren't you.

japanese: ……困っちゃうくらいに。
translation: ...To the point it's a problem for me.

japanese: お、おい、一花？
translation: H-hey, Ichika?

japanese: ごめん、まだドキドキしてて動けないかも。
translation: Sorry, my heart's pounding again, and I can't move.

japanese:
こうやって君に背中を預けてれば、
安心して、心臓も落ち着くと思うから――
translation:
I think if I rest my back on you like this,
I'll feel safe, and my heart will calm down%p-2;――

japanese: あと少しだけ、あと少しだけ……いいかな？
translation:
Just a little more, just a little more...
is that okay?

japanese: あ、ああ、構わないが……。
translation: Y-yeah, I don't mind...

japanese: 構うわよーー！
translation: WE MIND!

japanese: わっ！？
translation: WOAH?!

japanese: そんな指示は出してない。
translation: We didn't give those instructions.

japanese: 上杉君、やりすぎでは？
translation: Uesugi-kun, don't you think you're taking it too far?

japanese:
いやいや、これは不可抗力だ！
別に俺だって好きでこうしたわけじゃない！
お前ら、見てただろ！？
translation:
No, no, this was inevitable!
It's not like I want to do this or anything!
You guys were watching, right?!

japanese: フータロー君……私、やっぱり迷惑だった？
translation: Futaro-kun...did I actually annoy you?

japanese: い、いや……そんなことはないが……。
translation: N-no...that's not true...

japanese:
でも、すごく迷惑そうだし。
うっ……うううっ……。
translation:
But, I feel like I REALLY did annoy you.
Ooh...ooooohh...

japanese: おい！？　なんで泣くんだ！？
translation: Hey! Why are you crying?!

japanese: 一花、いい加減にしなさい。
translation: Ichika, get a hold of yourself.

japanese:
フータローも動揺しないで。
ますます一花にからかわれるから。
translation:
Futaro, don't get upset, either.
It'll set Ichika off even more.

japanese:
あはは、ごめんごめん。
ちょっと役に入り込みすぎちゃったかな。
translation:
Hahaha, sorry, sorry.
Perhaps I got into the role a little too much.
...HUH?

japanese:
あまりにも面白そうな展開だったから、
ちょっと演技しちゃった。
女優魂がうずいちゃって。
translation:
It was just such an interesting development,
that I acted a little bit.
My actress sense was tingling.

japanese:
はああ～！？　いつからだよ！
いつから演技してたんだ！？
translation:
WHAAA?! From when?!
From when were you acting?!

japanese: ナ・イ・ショ。
translation: It's a S-E-C-R-E-T.

japanese:
はーい！
一花と上杉さんの素敵な笑顔、
いただいちゃいましたー！
translation:
Okay!
We were able to get some beautiful shots
of your smiles, Ichika and Uesugi-san!

japanese: なっ！？
translation: Wha?!

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、本当にいい顔してたよ？
アルバムが楽しみだなー。
translation:
Big bro, you really have such a good look.
I'm excited to see the album.
